lore: Gargantuans are the largest creatures on the planet. They can reach heights of over 30 feet, but their movements are extremely slow and clumsy.\n\nDaunting Gargantuans were born of the mountains on which humans had once built mausoleums. When a creature dies in front of one of them, its soul joins the Gargantuan's temporarily, which greatly increases its strength and speed.
menagerieDialog: IDIOT... FOOL... STUPID...\n\n(The Gargantuan continues to throw lazy, half-baked insults at you.)
NEED TO STOMP SOMETHING, AND FAST. PATIENCE LOW.
NEW HOBBY. WANT TO EAT YOUR SPELL GEMS NOW.
ME ABOUT TO HAVE MAJOR TEMPER TANTRUM. NOT KNOW WHY.
HUNGRY? FOOD FOR YOU.\n\n(It hands you a small pile of stones. Thanks?)
name: Daunting Gargantuan
